column4: hello, anyone here who could help me with a GRUB related problem?
I have a MSI P965 Neo motherboard with a JMicron controller and after installing ubuntu on a sata disk GRUB gives error 21 in stage 1.5, I googled and it appears to be an infamous problem...
YEa, you can try setting bios to treat sata as ide..  not sure which MSI board I am on at the moment
I am on neo 945 here and yes acpi needs to be off
